long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your understanding of the dynamic war situation in Ukraine with the Topographic Overlay extension for the DeepStateMap.Live website. This extension adds a detailed topographic layer to the battle area, allowing you to visualize the terrain and gain a comprehensive perspective on the ongoing conflict.

Features:

Real-time Topographic Data: Stay informed about the geographical aspects of the war in Ukraine by overlaying accurate topographic information onto the DeepStateMap.Live website. The extension utilizes up-to-date data to ensure you have the most current understanding of the terrain.

Battle Area Visualization: With the topographic overlay, you can effortlessly grasp the layout of the battleground and observe how various strategic positions are affected by the surrounding topography. Analyze how elevation, slopes, and other geographic features shape the ongoing conflict.

Enhanced Situational Awareness: By combining the DeepStateMap.Live's detailed war situation with the topographic overlay, you can develop a more comprehensive understanding of the dynamics on the ground. Gain valuable insights into how the topography impacts troop movements, defensive positions, and tactical decision-making.

Enable or disable the topographic overlay with a simple toggle switch located in the bottom left corner.
